unnormalised: arre bhai, aiklay tem naven kes, "Sharma Electronics vs. Gupta Innovations" khobramni asa. dista Sharma Electronics-an Gupta Innovations-anchem solar panel tech-achem patent copy kelem. Gupta Innovations infringement mhuntat, 50 lakh rupea nuaksan bhorpai magtat! tanche Adv. mhunta ki tem Patents Act, 1970 antargat ekdum spasta kes asa. umed asa Gupta jinkta, intellectual property samballunk zai, tum zanna?
normalised: Arre bhai, aiklay mhunn te nove case, "Sharma Electronics versus Gupta Innovations" haberancher. Dista Sharma Electronics-an Gupta Innovations-chem patent copy kelem kiteak tor solar panel tech-ak. Gupta Innovations hakka ulhangon kel'lo mhunn sangta, rupiya pachas lakh nuksaan bhorpayi magta! Tanche Advocate sangtat ki tem spast case asa Patents Act-achea aadhin, ek hazar nau she ani sattor. Asha asa Gupta jikto, intellectual property sambhallpak zai, tuka khobor asa mhunn?
